## assertIsArray() function

Test whether a value is an array, and throw an informative error if it's not

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function assertIsArray(arg: unknown): asserts arg is any[];
```

|  arg | <code>unknown</code> |  |

<b>Returns:</b>
